Hi, I am Plugin Pal - your WordPress plugin assistant!
 To begin, please describe the plugin you want to create.
Create a plugin that adds share buttons for Facebook, X, and LinkedIn at the end of posts. The plugin should also provide a shortcode [social_share] to place the buttons anywhere.
Great—got it. We’ll add the buttons to the end of posts and also include a simple [social_share] tag you can place anywhere. I’ll start the plugin generation now; please hold on while it’s created.

requirements.name: Social Share Buttons
requirements.description: Adds Facebook, X, and LinkedIn share buttons at the end of posts and via a [social_share] tag.
requirements.details: Create a plugin that automatically appends share buttons for Facebook, X (Twitter), and LinkedIn to the end of single blog posts. Also provide a [social_share] tag that outputs the same buttons wherever it’s placed. Buttons should share the current page’s URL and title, open in a new tab, and include accessible labels. Keep styling minimal, horizontal, and theme-friendly (icons with optional text as space allows). No settings screen or tracking; just lightweight output that works on standard posts by default. If the tag is used, it should render the same button set in that location.

messages.content:
I've created your plugin, packaged as a zip, ready to download and install!. Here are some instructions on how to get started with it:
In your WordPress dashboard, go to Plugins > Add New > Upload Plugin, choose the ZIP we provided, click Install Now, then Activate. The share buttons will automatically appear at the end of single blog posts. To place them anywhere else, add the shortcode [social_share] in a post, page, or a shortcode-supported widget.
